1.content:
What path do you choose ?

( i'm taking requests if you're interested in this story)
1.title: Starts

13.content: You wake up dizzy in a street. It's night from what you can tell when you open your eyes, but everything seems...huge. You realize that you are now at the size of a bug. And from what you remember, you agreed to be an experimental subject to create better androids. It appears to you that things didn't go well...But you're not giving up. You hate androids, but for now the only thing you focus is to find some help to get your size back. And you hope to find a human, thought that you honestly can't make a difference between a human, and an android who became a deviant.
13.title: Detroit : Become human

info.brief_description: A gts story in a world where artificials humans refuse to be enslaved by humans
info.description:
A gts story in a world where artificials humans refuse to be enslaved by humans, Blade Runner and The game Detroit : become human fits the idea.

- Every stuffs is allowed !
